page.shortlink: api client api a5 listbox setlock method

argument.name: lock
argument.description: Whether or not to lock the list.

argument.name: html
argument.description: The HTML message to display inside the overlay element used to lock the list.

page.description: Lock the list to prevent user interaction.

discussion.p: The list can be locked to prevent user interaction. An element will overlay the list to which can contain a message to display while the list is locked.
